Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Map/mapper

Function map[&K, &V] mapper(map[&K, &V] M, &K (&K) F, &V (&V) G)
Description Apply the functions F and G to each key/value pair in a map and return the transformed map.
Examples 
rascal>import Map;
ok
rascal>str prefix(str s) { return "X" + s; }
str (str): str prefix(str);
rascal>int incr(int x) { return x + 1; }
int (int): int incr(int);
rascal>mapper(("apple": 1, "pear": 2, "ananas": 3), prefix, incr);
map[str, int]: ("Xpear":3,"Xananas":4,"Xapple":2)
[Edit] | [New] | [Compile Course] | [Warnings]
